### Total Chlorophyll

Sum of chlorophyll concentration of the four microalgae types (small, large, microphytobenthos, trichodesmium)

### Dissolved inorganic nitrogen

Concentration of dissolved inorganic nitrogen (DIN). DIN = \[NH4] + \[NO3].

### Total suspended solids

This is the sum of the suspended sediments in the water column. It is \[Fine sediment] + \[Mud] + \[Mud carbonate] + \[Mud mineral] + \[Dust]
